author: ondapc
title: Global ADA lottery
description: Every country has their own lottery system - some are more popular than others; most of them engage their users to weekly or daily drawings.
solution: Connecting the entire globe with an ADA lottery where say addresses that start with an alphanumeric sequence are awarded the dividens.
experience: Having worked with lottery applications - the strategy would be to use adapay for purchasing lottery tickets and building a site for users.
